value.excerpt: Mark Jacobs joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how Microsoft's internal enterprise increases compliance and creates a more trusted cloud environment using the Secure DevOps Kit for Azure (AzSK). value.title: How do Power Apps differ from Azure Logic Apps? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
